name: invoice_designs_llc

summary: The document defines a JSON schema for an invoice layout named "invoice_designs_llc" under the data model "american_airlines". The schema specifies required fields such as "billed_to", "date_issued", "due_date", "invoice_number", "amount_due", "items", "total", and "balance_due". Each field has a defined data type and description, outlining the structure for items, which include "description", "rate", "quantity", and "amount". This schema provides a structured format for representing invoice details and amounts.
